q: Barack Obama is famous and beloved because he speaks to people's hearts. he talks about our deepest values and asks us to be better people. this is something we respond to in a much bigger way than i'm going to cut your taxes. he speaks to young people and people of all colors like no other politician out there. yesterday online i read someone sneering that they were sick of him talking about hope. since when is hope bad? i
